Hi! I am Helen, a graphic designer turned software developer from Malaysia.

As a Front-End Developer, I love building sites and apps that help people reach their personal and professional goals.

I focus on responsive design, accessibility and scalability to create inclusive and dynamic user experiences.

I am always open to new opportunities and projects, so do not hesitate to get in touch.
